content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could assist you in finding a suitable rain cover for your camera and lens. The Op/Tech USA Rain Cover is a great choice, and I'm sure it will provide excellent protection for your gear.

Remember to adjust the cover's dimensions to fit your camera and lens snugly, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns.

Have a great time shooting in the mountains, and I hope you capture some amazing images! Don't let the weather stop you from getting the shots you want. Stay dry and happy shooting!
